TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlSchemaValidationFlags extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 和 類別 (Class) 所使用的結構描述驗證選項。

span.span: Specifies schema validation options used by the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的附註值與。The following are notes to consider when using values with the . - 值會定義結構描述，驗證所使用的驗證選項若要執行 XML 結構描述驗證。 values define validation options used by a schema validating to perform XML validation against a schema. 值，來驗證使用指定的屬性。 values for a validating are specified using the property. 以下是使用 AllowXmlAttributes 值時要考量的資訊。The following are notes to consider when using the AllowXmlAttributes value. 1. 當結構描述不會匯入的 Xml 命名空間。When a schema doesn’t import the Xml namespace. 1. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `true` （預設值） 和執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性，驗證引擎會載入預設 Xml 命名空間的結構描述的快照集，並將它用於驗證。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true` (default) and the instance document contains Xml attributes, the validation engine will load a snapshot of the default Xml namespace schema and use it for validation. 如果預設結構描述中找不到執行個體文件中所使用的 Xml 屬性，將不會驗證文件。If Xml attributes used in the instance document are not found in the default schema, the document will not validate. 2. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes`false`和執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性，則驗證引擎會報告發生錯誤。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false` and the instance document contains Xml attributes, the validation engine will report an error. 2. 當結構描述匯入沒有位置的 Xml 命名空間。When a schema imports the Xml namespace without a location. 1. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `true` （預設值） 和執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性，則驗證引擎會使用預設 Xml 命名空間的結構描述進行驗證。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true` (default) and the instance document contains Xml attributes, the validation engine will use the default Xml namespace schema for validation. 如果預設結構描述中找不到執行個體文件中所使用的 Xml 屬性，將不會驗證文件。If Xml attributes used in the instance document are not found in the default schema, the document will not validate. 2. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes`false`和執行個體文件包含不明確允許的結構描述，驗證引擎會報告錯誤的 Xml 屬性。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false` and the instance document contains Xml attributes that are not explicitly allowed by the schema, the validation engine will report an error. 3. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes`false`和執行個體文件包含明確允許的結構描述驗證引擎將會驗證屬性相同的方式，它會使用預設值 Xml 的其他屬性來驗證 Xml 屬性命名空間的結構描述。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false` and the instance document contains Xml attributes that are explicitly allowed by the schema, the validation engine will validate the attributes the same way it validates other attributes using the default Xml namespace schema. 3. 當結構描述匯入自訂的 Xml 命名空間結構描述，使用自訂的結構描述位置。When a schema imports a custom Xml namespace schema with a custom schemaLocation. 1. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `true` （預設值） 和執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性，則驗證引擎會使用自訂的 Xml 命名空間結構描述進行驗證。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true` (default) and the instance document contains Xml attributes, the validation engine will use the custom Xml namespace schema for validation. 如果指定的結構描述中找不到執行個體文件中所使用的 Xml 屬性，將不會驗證文件。If Xml attributes used in the instance document are not found in the specified schema, the document will not validate. 2. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes`false`和執行個體文件包含不明確允許的結構描述，驗證引擎會報告錯誤的 Xml 屬性。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false` and the instance document contains Xml attributes that are not explicitly allowed by the schema, the validation engine will report an error. 3. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes`false`和執行個體文件包含明確允許的結構描述驗證引擎將會驗證屬性相同的方式，它會使用指定的 Xml 的其他屬性來驗證 Xml 屬性命名空間的結構描述。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false` and the instance document contains Xml attributes that are explicitly allowed by the schema, the validation engine will validate the attributes the same way it validates other attributes using specified Xml namespace schema. 4. 當結構描述會定義 xml: \* 屬性使用 ="required"。When a schema defines an xml:\* attribute with use="required". 1. 下列適用於 je-li nastavena na AllowXmlAttributes`true`和`false`。The following applies when AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true` and `false`. 必要的 xml: \* 屬性應該視為其他屬性，並使用指定的 Xml 命名空間結構描述進行驗證。Required xml:\* attributes should be treated as other attributes and validated using the specified Xml namespace schema. 5. 當結構描述會定義 xml: \* 屬性使用 ="prohibited"。When a schema defines an xml:\* attribute with use="prohibited". 1. 下列適用於 je-li nastavena na AllowXmlAttributes`true`和`false`。The following applies when AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true` and `false`. 如果執行個體文件包含的 xml: \* 屬性明確禁止使用結構描述，驗證引擎會報告發生錯誤。If an instance document contains xml:\* attributes that are explicitly prohibited by the schema, the validation engine will report an error. 6. 當結構描述指定的屬性萬用字元。When a schema specifies an attribute wildcard. 1. 如果執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性和結構描述指定使用 processContents 省略或設為"strict 的"的屬性萬用字元，驗證引擎會使用 Xml 命名空間結構描述存在於。If an instance document contains an Xml attribute and the schema specifies an attribute wildcard with processContents either omitted or set to "strict", the validation engine will use the Xml namespace schema present in the . 如果未不指定任何 Xml 命名空間的結構描述，驗證引擎行為，如下所示。If no Xml namespace schema is specified, the validation engine will behave as follows. 2. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `true`，驗證引擎會使用預設 Xml 命名空間的結構描述，來執行驗證。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true`, the validation engine will use the default Xml namespace schema to perform validation. 3. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `false`，驗證引擎會報告發生錯誤。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false`, the validation engine will report an error. 4. 如果執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性和結構描述指定設為 「 略過 」 的 processContents 屬性萬用字元，則驗證引擎就會略過屬性驗證。If an instance document contains an Xml attribute and the schema specifies an attribute wildcard with processContents set to "skip", the validation engine will skip attribute validation. 5. 如果執行個體文件包含的 Xml 屬性和結構描述指定設為"lax"processContents 屬性萬用字元，驗證引擎會使用 Xml 命名空間結構描述存在於。If an instance document contains an Xml attribute and the schema specifies an attribute wildcard with processContents set to "lax", the validation engine will use the Xml namespace schema present in the . 如果未不指定任何 Xml 命名空間的結構描述，驗證引擎行為，如下所示。If no Xml namespace schema is specified, the validation engine will behave as follows. 6. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `true`，驗證引擎會使用預設 Xml 命名空間的結構描述，來執行驗證。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true`, the validation engine will use the default Xml namespace schema to perform validation. 7. 如果設定為 AllowXmlAttributes `false`，不會執行屬性驗證。If AllowXmlAttributes is set to `false`, attribute validation will not be performed. 7. 當驗證簡單型別。When validating simple types. 1. 當 AllowXmlAttributes 設`true`（預設值），將項目上的簡單型別允許 Xml 屬性。When AllowXmlAttributes is set to `true` (default), Xml attributes will be allowed on elements of simple types. ## Examples 如需類別，請參閱類別。For an example of the class, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags AllowXmlAttributes = int32(16)

summary.span: 允許 xml:\* 屬性，即使未在結構描述中定義它們也是如此。

span.span: Allow xml:\* attributes even if they are not defined in the schema.

summary.span: 對屬性的驗證會依據其資料型別進行。

span.span: The attributes will be validated based on their data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags None = int32(0)

summary.span: 請勿處理識別條件約束、內嵌結構描述、結構描述位置提示，或報告結構描述驗證警告。

span.span: Do not process identity constraints, inline schemas, schema location hints, or report schema validation warnings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags ProcessIdentityConstraints = int32(8)

summary.span: 處理驗證期間遇到的識別條件約束 (xs:ID、xs:IDREF、xs:key、xs:keyref、xs:unique)。

span.span: Process identity constraints (xs:ID, xs:IDREF, xs:key, xs:keyref, xs:unique) encountered during validation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags ProcessInlineSchema = int32(1)

summary.span: 處理驗證期間遇到的內嵌結構描述。

span.span: Process inline schemas encountered during validation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags ProcessSchemaLocation = int32(2)

summary.span: 處理驗證期間遇到的結構描述位置提示 (xsi:schemalocation、xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation)。

span.span: Process schema location hints (xsi:schemaLocation, xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation) encountered during validation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags ReportValidationWarnings = int32(4)

summary.span: 報告驗證期間遇到的結構描述驗證警告。

span.span: Report schema validation warnings encountered during validation.
